topic.title: Topic
topic.description: Specific topic within the subject (e.g., Fractions, Photosynthesis)

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.description: Learning objectives (optional - AI will generate if not provided)

local_context.title: Local Context
local_context.description: Local context for the lesson (e.g., rural school, urban setting, available resources)

author_id.title: Author Id
author_id.description: User ID of the lesson plan author
